definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: That swindle soured a great many potential investors.
sentences.chinese: 那種行騙行爲令許多想去投資的人慾往而止。

sentences.english: I wish to apply for Automatic Add Value Service for Supplementary Credit Cardholder.
sentences.chinese: 本人慾爲附屬卡客戶申請自動增值服務。

sentences.english: Don't assume that he views you as nothing more than an object for him to use.
sentences.chinese: 不要認爲他只是把你當作泄慾工具。

sentences.english: Pedestrians in deep sorrow on the road.
Why do all men have a thing for manipulation?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼所有的男人都有控制慾？

sentences.english: The outcome ranges between a total disaster and a terrible heart ache to wonderful love stories that are pure, genuine, emotional-fulfilling and highly sexual.
sentences.chinese: 結果不外乎就是災難心痛分手和靈慾合一的真愛之間。

sentences.english: Romantic love or lust is the first stage of love.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫戀曲，或者叫愛慾階段，是第一階段。

sentences.english: People want to kill Ya Ling Xu Ming, a funeral to cover all escape his procrastination.
sentences.chinese: 凌虛上人慾殺明涯，阿喪爲掩護衆人逃跑捨命拖延。

sentences.english: If you have someone of special interest with you, you need to remember that the room belongs to two people.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人對你愛慾迸發，記住房間屬於兩個人。

sentences.english: Also meditate on one who has attained desirelessness.
sentences.chinese: 也可靜心冥想一個已經達到無慾的人。

sentences.english: So yes, you might say I've got control issues.
sentences.chinese: 所以你可能會認爲我的控制慾過強。

sentences.english: And if you don’t aspire to anything, how can you be frustrated?
sentences.chinese: 倘若你無求無慾，怎麼能會有挫折感呢？

sentences.english: The children will also likely grow up to inherit this trait.
sentences.chinese: 當他們長大後則傾向於繼承父母的強控制慾。

sentences.english: Classic : Man exists in erotic tension toward the divine ground of his existence.
sentences.chinese: 人活在一種對其存在的神性根基的愛慾的緊張中。

sentences.english: He also displayed an early ease in front of a camera and a desire to act.
sentences.chinese: 他在鏡頭前面也顯得很大方，也有強烈的表演慾。

sentences.english: I would like to cancel Auto-conversion Option.
sentences.chinese: 本人慾取消自動轉換裏數安排。

definition: to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to cling to/to be reluctant to give up (sth)/to have a fondness for (an indulgence etc)
to feel attached to/to long for/to love
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to suffer from pent-up frustrations/mental knot/emotional issue
